enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, making 'remove' a suitable setup for 'removeAll'.
Both methods require reindexing the collection after modifications, making 'reindex' a suitable setup for 'removeAll'.
The 'removeAll' method relies on 'removeFromIndex' to update the index after removing elements.
The 'removeAll' method may require reindexing the collection after removing multiple elements.
